text: aur hamane jab kabhee koee paigambar bheja to usakee qaum kee zabaan mein baaten karata hua (taaki usake saamane (hamaare ehaqaam) bayaan kar sake to yahee khuda jise chaahata hai gumaraahee mein chhod deta hai aur jis kee chaahata hai hidaayat karata hai vahee sab par gaalib hikamat vaala hai
